title: Introducing: Madeline Mondrala
body:
With a debut EP featuring fifteen different people, you can bet that New York singer/songwriter **Madeline Modrala** has big ambitions.

_**Cloud**_, a five track release that swoops from hip-hop / rap inspired gems (_Blood Brother_) to far more sombre numbers (_Bad Kid_), is choc-a-bloc with tantalizing arrangements and showcases **Modrala** as a potential future star. There’s a wonderfully disjointed air to each track, never quite flowing with the same bravado that you expect from music with that features clarinets, flutes and french horns, amongst other instruments.

Quietly confident in her own ability, it’s _Maybe_ where **Madeline** really excels, a bittersweet ode to a weary lover. Check out her debut EP in full below, and the video for _Blood Brother_ underneath that.

_I wanna be excavated / dig up the fossils in me / that lie awake and awaiting_
